title.rendered: WHY IS IT IMPORTANT FOR A BUILDING TO HAVE LEED Platinum CERTIFICATION, AND HOW DO YOU GET IT?

content.rendered: CALEDONIAN is currently immersed in the first office development in the company’s history. A complex with a built area of 9,447 sqm, a plot of 5,086 sqm and 3,500 sqm of landscaping, it is also the closest building to the centre of Madrid of all those along the A6 highway to A Coruña. Its name: CALEDONIAN HQ (Headquarters).

Its name: CALEDONIAN HQ (Headquarters).
